descriptions.short: Automatically applies Items on different triggers
descriptions.key:
Each Trigger will apply all buffs to the right of it.
For each item in the 'Off' state: do nothing
OnSpawn: Will trigger when the hunt starts, or the player carts/respawns
StartOfCombat: Will trigger whenever the player enters a combat state (or after sleep/wakup, or wyvern riding)
WeaponDraw: Whenever the hunter draws their weapons
Always: Whenever the buff expires, it will re-apply
descriptions.debug: Debug Info (send a screenshot of this info along with the bug report)
descriptions.jsonWarning: WARNING: JSON utils not available (your REFramework version may be outdated). Configuration will not be saved between restarts.
